title: School Credit
itunes:title: School Credit
description:
FRI 9/16 - The Breakfast Club discusses the questionably-freaky Friday question raised by Actress Shailene Woodley, "Would you be OK with schools teaching masturbation in sex ed/health class?" Then we take the freak out of Friday and talk credit report tips with expert & credit repair guru Jeanne Kelly. Gotta love Financially Freaky Fridays...Freaky Fiscal Fridays? Ok, we'll stop.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
